text: Otto Stich (10 January 1927 â€“ 13 September 2012) was a Swiss politician. He was born in Basel. Stich was elected to the Federal Council of Switzerland on 7 December 1983 and handed over office on 31 October 1995. He was a member of the Social Democratic Party. During his office time he held the Federal Department of Finance and was President of the Confederation in 1988 and again in 1994. Stich died on 13 September 2012 in Dornach, Switzerland at the age of 85.Tenacious former cabinet minister dies at 85 == References == == Other websites == * * Category:1927 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Presidents of the Swiss Confederation Category:Members of the Federal Council (Switzerland) Category:Politicians from Basel
title: Otto Stich
